front.title: YANG Groupings for TLS Clients and TLS Servers

abstract.t: This document presents four YANG 1.1 modules. Three IETF modules, and one supporting IANA module. The three IETF modules are: ietf-tls-common, ietf-tls-client, and ietf-tls-server. The "ietf-tls-client" and "ietf-tls-server" modules are the primary productions of this work, supporting the configuration and monitoring of TLS clients and servers. The IANA module is: iana-tls-cipher-suite-algs. This module defines YANG enumerations providing support for an IANA-maintained algorithm registry.
